tagline: Fun games with HTML, CSS and JavaScript
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome CoderDojo Coolest Games Course

This course was designed to teach key programming principles in a really fun way. The course is aimed to teach every participate
* Variables
* Logic
* Loops
* Functions
* Objects

### Thanks to our amazing contributors
* Ben Chapman (https://github.com/BenChapman)
* Ian Duffy (https://github.com/imduffy15)
* Noel King (https://github.com/noelking)

### Game 1 Penalty shootout

#### Play the game
http://dojo.hallamor.org/eden/dcu/soccer-game/index.html

#### Lessons

| [001 Build the pitch](https://github.com/CoderDojo/htmlgamedev/blob/master/soccer-game/001%20Build%20the%20webpage/readme.md) | [Code](https://github.com/CoderDojo/htmlgamedev/tree/master/soccer-game/001%20Build%20the%20webpage)
name: CoderDojo Coolest Games Course
